content: As an AI language model, I don't have access to real-time information, including current exhibitions at the State Art Museum of Novosibirsk or other galleries and museums. It's best to check directly with the museum's website or contact them to find out what exhibitions are currently on display. However, the State Art Museum of Novosibirsk has a permanent collection of more than 12,000 works, so even if there are no special exhibitions on display, you will still be able to enjoy a large and impressive collection of art. Enjoy your visit!
